title: Living things are everywhere
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bert Van Bork
brief_description: Uses the story of a young boy’s discovery of the variety of living things to be found along a river bank and in the woods to explain that living things may be discovered almost anywhere and to stimulate interest in the study of plant and animal relationships.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bert Van Bork
